summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 25, D.T. Denny's Home Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue North and Queen Anne Avenue, from Harrison Street to Republican Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9660 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
